name: sofia-sdk-examples
description: Sofia SDK Integration Examples - Complete implementation showcases for Vanilla TypeScript, Angular, and AngularJS development tools, dynamic configuration, and real-time debugging capabilities

scripts.security:check: command -v trivy >/dev/null 2>&1 && trivy fs . --format table --severity HIGH,CRITICAL || echo '⚠️  Trivy not installed. Install with: brew install trivy'
scripts.secrets:check: command -v gitleaks >/dev/null 2>&1 && gitleaks detect --source . --config .gitleaks.toml --no-banner || echo '⚠️  GitLeaks not installed. Install with: brew install gitleaks'
scripts.security: npm run security:check && npm run secrets:check

author: Omniloy
